body:
As noted by @sbna. He's trying to build a spack package as a CMakePackage as a module for OpenFOAM.  Getting the OpenFOAM environment properly initialized before the build is rather _challenging_.

Is there a spack-like or cmake-like means of sourcing a shell script prior to starting the cmake?
@alalazo - any experience there?

If not, it might be a case of generating a build wrapper ourselves and then calling that. Not really elegant, but might work reliably.

/mark
title: difficult to pass OpenFOAM env to a CMakePackage
